Identity.History: Woodland hunters, rangers, and guides, during wartime Town Lookouts are called to served as perimeter guards and lookouts of Hyrule's outermost cities. Armed with a bow and arrow, these fast citizens can attack enemies from afar and make good use of their hunting skills to provide food to armies.
Identity.Tooltip: Medium Archer unit armed with a bow and arrows. Deals moderate Piercing damage, but is more survivable compared to Archer units from most other factions.
